ValidationRule.description: Transfers from CE to Compliance are only allowed for specific categories.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL( $User.Team__c , 'Client Support' ) && Owner:Queue.DeveloperName = 'Compliance' && ISCHANGED( OwnerId ) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Category__c, 'New Comp')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Category__c, '5500')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Category__c, 'Plan Compliance')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Category__c, 'Plan Update')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Category__c, ''))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Only the following categories can be transferred to Compliance: New Comp, 5500, Plan Compliance, Plan Update
